summary: Moicom\'s awesome Guy Fawkes mask as a \"circlet\" without the hood.
descriptionHtml:
Moicom\'s Guy Fawkes Mask as a \"circlet\" without the hood. Can be worn with anything a circlet can be worn with...
Sorry, no quest to blow up the elder council comes with this mod either, but the mask is just as awesome as ever!

You can find it in-game next to the masks form the original mod, in a box at the Apprentice stone.

If you want to use this with any other helmet or hood or hat or whatever, there are many nice Circlets with \"insert head gear type here\" mods out there, should work.
If you like this mod be sure to check out the original mod by Moicom.

Full credit to Moicom (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/332004/?) for the Mesh and Texture.

Original mod(s):
Standalone: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17151/?
Replacer: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7021/?
author: KRUZiiK
